content: materials purl soho s cotton pure 1 100% organically grown cotton each skein is approximately 279 yards/ 100 grams - main color mc 1 skein approximately 115 yards required we used heirloom white - contrast color cc 1 skein approximately 105 yards required we used coastal blue moonflower blue and peach peony you will also need - us 5 3 75 mm 16-inch circular needles 2 - two us 5 double pointed needles 3 for i-cord and 3-needle bind-off - a few yards of smooth scrap yarn and crochet hook 4 to match - a stitch marker 5 - a cable stitch holder 6 gauge 48 stitches and 54 rounds = 4 inches in stitch pattern size finished dimensions approximately 6¾ inches square designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 7 click here 8 to see even more of hiromi s work 1 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-pure html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23805 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23859 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 8 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
